title: Sound On: Fed Rate Hike, Trump’s Enduring GOP Grip
itunes:title: Sound On: Fed Rate Hike, Trump’s Enduring GOP Grip
description:
Heather Boushey, member of the White House Council of Economic Advisers, Arkansas Republican Congressman French Hill, Bloomberg politics reporter Mark Niquette, and Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
